title: (x) Matthew Barney "Drawing Restraint" website - Franklin Gothic {Chris Mitchison}
content:
Hi,

Does anybody recognize this font?

[http://www.drawingrestraint.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160933/http:/www.drawingrestraint.net/ "http://www.drawingrestraint.net/")

Many thanks,

David

author: panr235

comments.content: Looks like an abused News Gothic but that might be a bit of a stretch...
Franklin Gothic Condensed italicised I reckon guvnor.
